Sns.Subject: AWS Budgets: service-catalog_987654 has exceeded your alert threshold
Sns.Message:
AWS Budget Notification July 23, 2020
AWS Account 123456789

Dear AWS Customer,

You requested that we alert you when the ACTUAL Cost associated with your service-catalog_987654 budget is greater than $1.50 for the current year. The ACTUAL Cost associated with this budget is $1.81. You can find additional details below and by accessing the AWS Budgets dashboard [1].

Budget Name: service-catalog_987654
Budget Type: Cost
Budgeted Amount: $1.50
Alert Type: ACTUAL
Alert Threshold: > $1.50
ACTUAL Amount: $1.81

[1] https://console.aws.amazon.com/billing/home#/budgets
